---
name: Specific bug or a very concrete improvement
about: Create a report to help us improve

---

Please only open an issue if you have identified a specific bug or a very concrete improvement for the software or documentation provided in this project.

If you have questions about your specific home appliance or how to use the software, the Discussions section is the right place for you.

If you would like to share a configuration for an appliance or suggest an improvement for the software or documentation right away, these are highly welcome! Please open a Pull Request.

Please delete this text when creating an issue.
